message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but $8000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10000. Would you be interested in that price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to sell it to me at that price?
I'm getting close to your price, but I still think the product is worth more than $9000. I'm willing to meet you at $10500. Is that a price you'd be comfortable with?
I've already offered $9000, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I'm willing to meet you at that price, so I'm making a final offer of $9000. Please let me know if that's acceptable to you.
I understand you're firm on your price, but I still think I can get a better deal. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
